Name: "Gate of Phantasm"
Desc: The Phantasmal Gate located at the center of Vanarana.\nSometimes, Aranara use such mysterious items to protect their dreams from being disturbed. Nevertheless, after many moons, many dreams have also dissipated like bubbles in the sun, leaving only doors that lead to now-defunct dreams and fantasies scattered across the forest.\nPlace this one in the Serenitea Pot and it will help you protect the Realm Within, even if just a bit.
